job_description:
49 Solutions is looking for a Senior System Developer Consultant to respond to a Request For Proposal (RFP) with Women and Gender Equality Canada (WAGE). If we are successful, this would be a long-term contract opportunity. The System Developer is required to plan, build and implement modern applications to comply with growing business requirements based on PowerPlatform. The System Developer will build an integrated, client-centred service delivery model along with reengineered business processes to increase opportunities to automate transactions and self-service capabilities. The System Developers will work with dedicated Modernization and IT teams, to build a client centered PowerApps which will modernize business processes and optimize systems integration.

Please see below for the requirements.

If this sounds like a good fit for you, and are interested in being put forward, kindly reach out with your CV and I would be happy to discuss next steps! Please feel free to pass on this posting to anyone you think might be a good fit; but don’t forget to ask about our referral program if you do.

The work must be conducted in English. However, the contractor may need to be able to communicate in French during meetings.

Requirements

Requirements:
To design, develop, test, debug, install, implement, modify and support new applications software, systems software and perform the necessary systems administration to provide a total systems solution in accordance with the WAGE standard IT policies and practices
At least 10 years of experience in system/software development projects involving complex architectures:
These projects MUST include 5 years of experience in PowerApps/Dynamics 365 development and a technical understanding of relationships, dependencies and requirements of hardware and software components necessary to enable software development processes to evolve through applications development/enhancements
At least five 5 years of experience in developing REST API’s using Visual Studio and C# that integrate external systems with systems based on PowerApps. The required experience must also include custom development using JavaScript and plugins
At least two (2) years of experience in developing complex BI Reports based on data from SQL Server or Dataverse.
Has completed at least 3 projects with within the last 8 years in one or more of the following fields:
General platform modernization projects; or
Grants & Contributions project; or
systems integration of IT enabled projects; or
projects for a similar number of users
Has completed at least 3 projects with a federal department within the last 10 years where they have comprehensively evaluated and initiated the change processes necessary to enhance integrated technologies and services
Federal Government Experience considered an asset
The work must be conducted in English. However, when the contractor will consult the stakeholders, the communications, written and spoken, must be done in the language preference of the consulted stakeholders which will include French or English
Reliability Security Clearance
